column1: H<s>ave you ever, even once, used any prescription sedative in any way a doctor did not direct you to use it?</s>

column2: Len : 2    EVER USED SEDATIVE NOT DIRECTED BY DR
OTE: The variable SEDNMREC is a recoded variable that was created from SEDNMLIF, the 12-month misuse variables of specific sedatives,
Len : 2    RC - MOST RECENT SEDATIVE MISUSE (RECODE)
83 = DID NOT MISUSE PST 12 MOS (LIFETIME UNK) Log assn ................................
OTE: SEDNMINIT is "reverse coded" from the answers in SVL03. SVL03=1 (yes) was recoded to 2 in SEDNMINIT because this answer means
that the respondent misused sedatives before the past 12 months (and therefore is not a past year initiate for misuse of sedatives). SVL03=2 (no)
was recoded to 1 in SEDNMINIT because this answer means that the respondent did not misuse sedatives before the past 12 months (and therefore

column1: is a past year initiate for misuse of sedatives).

column2: arlier questions were about the past 12 months. This question is about any time before then, that is, any time in your life before [DATEFILL].
<s>t any time before [DATEFILL], did you ever use any prescription sedative in a way a doctor did not direct you to use it?</s>
Len : 2    PAST YEAR INITIATE FOR ANY SEDATIVE MISUSE
4 = Not past yr initiate LOG ASSN (from skip pattern) ......................................................
83 = NOT PAST YR INITIATE (AT-RISK STATUS UNKNOWN) ................................
93 = DID NOT MISUSE SEDATIVES IN THE PAST 12 MOS .......................................
OTE: The variables SEDNMAGE, SEDNMYFU, and SEDNMMFU show the age, year, and month of first misuse, respectively, for respondents

column1: <s>who initiated misuse of sedatives in the 12 months prior to being interviewed (SEDNMINIT=1).</s>

column2: Len : 3    RC - AGE AT 1ST MISUSE FOR PAST YR SED INITIATES
